topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a85e4763687248e30002b8#post_55a85e4763687248e30002b8
I'd hate to point out the obvious, *BUT* money wise there isn't actually a comic book hero boom.  Right now what is bringing in the money is Avengers films.  What I mean by this is that Avengers right now is worth more than every other marvel franchise combined.

Yes Captain Marvel movie will probably make a decent amount of money, yes comic books are selling well right now, *BUT* once Avengers 4 is done the comic book industry is probably going to crash really fucking hard cause if you have one franchise that is bringing in the super majority of the money once that movie series ends there's going to be a massive fucking bubble pop.

Tl:dr; you're vastly overestimating how popular the captain marvel movie is probably going to be.
